description:
The current head of the Millenion Syndicate.
Harry`s callous violence in dealing with any obstacles in his path to power earned him the nickname "Bloody Harry".
Harry came to power by making corpses out of friends and enemies alike - including his best friend Brandon Heat. Now at the head of his organization, Harry uses monstrous man-made zombies to enforce his iron rule. But now, Brandon is back as "Beyond the Grave" and has started to hunt Harry down...
name: Harry MacDowel
